short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pou is a virtual pet game which Help this cute little alien grow by feeding, cleaning, and playing with them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pou Online game is available in the chrome web store just install it and play.

Pou is a simulation game developed by Zakeh Ltd. Do you have what it takes to look after your own alien pet? Feed it, clean it, play with it, and watch it grow up while levelling up and unlocking new wallpapers and outfits to suit your personal preferences.

Note: Other games are available to play.

Controls:-

 Use the mouse or tap the screen to interact with Pou and the objects.
